UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Maximin 9, a novel free thiol containing antimicrobial peptide with antimycoplas ma activity from frog Bombina maxima.
Literature.Author: Lee WH, Zhang J, Zhang YX, Jin Y, Lai R, Zhang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=75µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=150µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCCB 10104(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(no activity data),Mycoplasma hominis(no activity data),Ureaplasma urealyticum strain 1(no activity data)
